folder: Allerton Avenue & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Allerton Avenue - White Plains Road
text:
Allerton Ave.(left), east from White Plains Road. The extensive property on both sides of the avenue extending east to Boston Road (signs thereon) is the former L.H. Mace Estate, which in 1913 belonged to the American Real Estate Company.(See Bromley's maps of 1900 and 1913.)
1917.

folder: Allerton Avenue & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Allerton Avenue - White Plains Road
text:
690 Allerton Ave., at the S.W. corner of White Plains Road (left). On the latter Ave. is visible the elevated station of the I.R.T. Lexington Ave. subway line.
1930.
